010package imagingbook.common.color.iterate;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.Random;
014
015/**
016 * Instances of this class create a sequence of random colors.
017 * TODO: Improve randomness (currently not too good, much red ...), modify saturation?. 
018 * TODO: Add color type/saturation/pastel ...
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 * @version 2022/04/06
022 *
023 */
024public class RandomHueGenerator implements ColorSequencer {
025        
026        private float h = 0.0f;
027        private float s = 0.9f;
028        private float b = 0.9f;
029        private final Random rnd; 
030
031        public RandomHueGenerator() {
032                rnd = new Random();
033        }
034        
035        public RandomHueGenerator(long seed) {
036                rnd = new Random(seed);
037        }
038        
039        @Override
040        public Color next() {
041                //h = (h + 0.8f + 0.3f * (float)rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
042                //h = (float) (h + rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
043                h = (h + 0.1f + 0.8f * rnd.nextFloat()) % 1.0f;
044                return Color.getHSBColor(h, s, b); 
045        }
046
047}
